mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student(student_id, name, gender, phone_number, status, label, password, has_bedroom, bedroom_id, verification_code, user_type) values (#{studentId}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{phoneNumber}, #{status}, #{label}, #{password}, #{hasBedroom}, #{bedroomId}, #{verificationCode}, #{userType})
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET student_id=#{studentId}, name=#{name}, gender=#{gender}, phone_number=#{phoneNumber}, status=#{status}, label=#{label}, password=#{password}, has_bedroom=#{hasBedroom}, bedroom_id=#{bedroomId}, verification_code=#{verificationCode}, user_type=#{userType} WHERE student_id=#{studentId}
